name: T - Nina Fernando
_source: speak;Fernando; I'm glad that you're here, and I see you've brought reinforcements.
speak;Nina; They were a last minute addition to the plan,{w} but these are the people Sarah was talking about.{w} The ones she wanted to permanently join us.

speak;Fernando; Well I'll be damned!{w} That'd be a massive addition to our numbers.{w} For now, though, let's take care of these bandits.{w} Their leader is predictably well fortified and guarded,{w} but we should be able to lure them out in one strike.
speak;Nina; And you're sure it will work?
speak;Fernando; Have my strategies ever failed you?{w} Now, let's show these bandits who The Defiants really are,{w} and why they shouldn't cross us!
